message.content:
cs.CV, cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.IR 

The paper focuses on integrating computer vision and natural language processing, which suggests that it could belong to several sub-categories. The most likely sub-category is cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition) since the paper deals with image captioning and visual question answering. The second likely sub-category is cs.CL (Computation and Language) since the paper also deals with natural language processing. The third likely sub-category is cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) since the paper proposes a method to reduce the semantic gap between vision and language. The fourth likely sub-category is cs.LG (Machine Learning) since the paper uses attention mechanisms to highlight relevant information. The fifth likely sub-category is cs.IR (Information Retrieval) since the paper deals with finding correlated spatial information.
